messages.message: More an idea than feedback, but if we are looking to build an app ecosystem would we ever consider creating an option so users can build apps, then if it becomes really popular they get a cut of the credit usage/payment. Almost gamify the experience of building an app with some incentive for the builder? @Varun Jain with your talk today of apps climbing the leaderboard it came to mind (inspiration from the gaming industry where this works incredibly well).

Yes, that is the intent long term. In the early days we will be working closely with early developers to publish the initial 3rd party apps. We do think about our apps portfolio as a gaming studio :slightly_smiling_face: @avi
